1. Production Supervisor- Faulu Flour Mills, Jan- June 2018
Maintained work flow in the factory by monitoring the production process,
observing control points and equipment, monitoring personnel and resources,
implementing cost reduction, developed reporting procedures and appraising job
results.
Duties and Responsibilities
o Ensure the good quality of the processed maize flour.
o Take charge of operations when the manager is not around
o Assist any new or inexpert workers get necessary training
o Efficiently supported employer’s core values of safety, quality and people
o Provide guidance and leadership to employees
o Manage shift inventory and maintain work instructions
o Maintained cleaning of area and equipment
2. Research Assistant Kenya National Bureau of Statistics- Jan- May 2017
The Census aimed at investigating the economic activity and structure of
establishments at the National and County levels. The information obtained from the
Census was mainly used for updating the business register to provide a sampling
framework for conducting various establishment based surveys.
Key Responsibilities
o Identify suitable techniques for the collection and analysis of data.
o Assisting in the development & preparation of research schedules and budgeting
o Travelling to pre-sampled business entities and research visits in other institutions.
o Contributing to team decisions about research directions.
o Ensuring the validity and reliability of data at all times.
o Data coding, data entry, transcribing, data analysis & assistance with writing up.
o Producing regular reports for analysis and publication
3. Business Researcher Metropol Limited Corporation (October 2015)
The market survey for credit rating in the Small and Medium Enterprise Businesses in
Bungoma County sought to assess the credit worthiness of the businesses and how
accessibility of credit from suppliers and financial service providers and its impact on
businesses
Duties & Responsibilities
o Traveling to the field sites to collect and record data as appropriate to the specific
objectives of the study.
o Filling and verifying reports in the provided templates and enter data into computer
database for subsequent analysis.
o Assist in the development of interview schedules; contacting subjects to
introduce and explain study objectives and protocol, and to arrange interviews,
either in person or by telephone.
o Reviewing and editing data to ensure completeness and accuracy of information;
following up with the subjects to resolve problems or clarify data collected.
4. Intern at the Revenue Department. County Government of Bungoma ( September 2014-
January 2015)
